definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: The pelting rain soaked his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 傾盆大雨淋透了他的衣服。

sentences.english: Festivities were undeterred by the heavy downpour.
sentences.chinese: 歡慶活動在傾盆大雨下如期舉行。

sentences.english: Sometimes a mist seemed to be falling, and sometimes there was a sudden downpour of heavy, slanting rain.
sentences.chinese: 一忽兒像是下大霧，突然間又下起傾盆大雨。

sentences.english: He met a drench of rain.
A heavy downpour caused the wall of his house to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一場傾盆大雨沖壞了他家的圍牆。

sentences.english: A heavy rain sudden comes, so i have to take shelter at a porch.
sentences.chinese: 突然傾盆大雨，我只好在一個門廊處避一避。

sentences.english: We just started to lay out the picnic and the heavens opened.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛開始擺開時餐，天就下起傾盆大雨來了。

sentences.english: A rare dry-season downpour produced the thundering runoff.
sentences.chinese: 一次非常乾旱季節的傾盆大雨產生了雷鳴般的急流。

sentences.english: The downpour transformed a local machinery factory into a huge pond.
sentences.chinese: 傾盆大雨將當地一個機械廠變成一個巨大的魚塘。

sentences.english: For a moment the sun was shining, then came the pouring rain.
sentences.chinese: 前一刻還是豔陽高照，隨後就是傾盆大雨。
傾盆大雨劈頭蓋臉地澆了下來。

sentences.english: The crops of entire rice fields have been rotted by torrential rain.
sentences.chinese: 所有稻田的農作物因傾盆大雨而腐爛。

sentences.english: Bob was in a pickle when his car broke down in a pouring rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 鮑勃的汽車在傾盆大雨中熄火，使他狼狽不堪。

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs when Tom was leaving yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天湯母離開時，正下傾盆大雨。

sentences.english: We had to bail on ou golf game，it’s pouring rain outside.
sentences.chinese: 我們只得放棄高爾夫比賽，外面正在下着傾盆大雨。

definition: howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3

definition: lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
